resources.string:
Hi {name}, my name is {bot_name}!

I'm developed by @ridhwan_aziz. I hope I can manage your needs in group 😊

For help you can type /help

Hello {name}!

I'm {bot_name} and I developed by @ridhwan_aziz.
If you found any bugs, just report to him :)

Powered by Telethon {version}
Your report has been successfully submitted and will be reviewed by the developer
Sorry, use it from private chat!
Unfortunately, I\'m not admin in here :(
You do not have admin privileges!
Don\'t use it on private chat!
🛑 Warning: I\'m unable to find this user:\n{user}
🛑 Warning: I\'m unable to find this users:\n{user}
🛑 Warning: I\'m unable to find this users:\n{user}
⚠️ Unhandled error: {error}\n\nPlease report it to my owner or by using /report_bug command!

Report bug template:

/report_bug Which command?
Error message?
Is replied?
Is user is admin?
Is bot is admin?
Additional info:
Arguments too long! Allowed arguments is 4000 characters length!
